sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { getPRLMonitoring } from '../../services/api'; const Monitoring = ({ user }) => { const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [debugInfo, setDebugInfo] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetchStats(); }, [user?.id]); const fetchStats = async () => { try { setLoading(true); setError(''); setDebugInfo('Fetching monitoring data...'); console.log('PRL Monitoring - Fetching data for PRL:', user); const response = await getPRLMonitoring(user.id); console.log('Monitoring API Response:', response); const monitoringData = response.data || response || {}; setStats(monitoringData); setDebugInfo(` PRL ID: ${user.id} User Role: ${user.role} Data Loaded: ${monitoringData ? 'Yes' : 'No'} `); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching monitoring stats:', error); setError(`Failed to load monitoring data: ${error.message}`); setDebugInfo(`Error: ${error.message}`); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; // Test function to load sample monitoring data const loadSampleData = () => { const sampleStats = { total_lecturers: 8, total_reports: 45, avg_attendance: 78.5, total_courses: 12, pending_feedback: 15, completed_feedback: 30, total_students: 320, stream_name: "Information Technology", recent_reports: [ { course: "Web Development", lecturer: "Dr. Smith", date: "2024-01-15", attendance: 85 }, { course: "Database Systems", lecturer: "Prof. Johnson", date: "2024-01-16", attendance: 92 }, { course: "Network Security", lecturer: "Dr. Brown", date: "2024-01-17", attendance: 88 } ], attendance_trend: [75, 80, 78, 82, 85, 79, 81], report_compliance: 87.5 }; setStats(sampleStats); setDebugInfo('Loaded sample monitoring data for testing'); console.log('Sample monitoring data loaded:', sampleStats); }; if (loading) { return (

Loading monitoring data...

{debugInfo}
); } if (!stats) { return (
{/* Debug Panel */}
PRL MONITORING DEBUG INFO
PRL ID: {user?.id} | Role: {user?.role}
Monitoring Data: Not Available
{debugInfo}

Stream Monitoring Dashboard

No Monitoring Data Available

This could be because:

  • No lecturers are assigned to your stream
  • No reports have been submitted yet
  • There might be a data loading issue
{error && (
Error: {error}
)}
); } return (
{/* Debug Panel */}
PRL MONITORING DEBUG INFO
PRL ID: {user?.id} | Role: {user?.role}
Stream: {stats.stream_name || 'Not specified'}
{debugInfo}

Stream Monitoring Dashboard

{stats.stream_name || 'Academic Stream'}
{error && (
Notice: {error}
)}
Total Lecturers

{stats.total_lecturers || 0}

Total Reports

{stats.total_reports || 0}

Avg Attendance

{stats.avg_attendance ? Math.round(stats.avg_attendance) : 0}%

Total Courses

{stats.total_courses || 0}

{/* Additional Stats Row */}
Pending Feedback

{stats.pending_feedback || 0}

Completed Feedback

{stats.completed_feedback || 0}

Total Students

{stats.total_students || 0}

Compliance Rate

{stats.report_compliance ? Math.round(stats.report_compliance) : 0}%

Stream Overview

This dashboard provides comprehensive monitoring of teaching activity and performance in your academic stream.

  • Monitor lecturer reporting compliance - Track submission rates and timeliness
  • Track student attendance trends - Identify patterns and areas for improvement
  • Review teaching quality metrics - Assess learning outcomes and feedback
  • Manage feedback workflow - Ensure all reports receive timely review
{stats.recent_reports && stats.recent_reports.length > 0 && (
Recent Reports
{stats.recent_reports.map((report, index) => ( ))}
Course Lecturer Date Attendance
{report.course} {report.lecturer} {new Date(report.date).toLocaleDateString()} {report.attendance}%
)}
Quick Actions
); }; export default Monitoring;
